original_title: Portrait of former Colombo Mayor Muzammil unveiled
original_body_lines: The portrait of former Mayor of Colombo A.J.M. Muzammil was unveiled at the Colombo Municipal Council premises on Monday by Municipal Commissioner Badrani Jayawardena in the presence of Muzammil who is now the Governor of the Uva Province.

A.J.M. Muzammil has a distinguished history in public service, having occupied various prominent positions within the Government. His roles have included serving as the Mayor of Colombo and holding key governmental positions. Additionally, he was a member of the Western Provincial Council.

This event signifies the recognition and commemoration of A.J.M. Muzammil’s contributions to public service and his significance within the political landscape. The presence of various officials, including the Municipal Commissioner, and Muzammil himself, highlights the importance of this event in acknowledging his achievements.
